p: As shown in Figure 2, CCK8 assay was used to measure the proliferation of MG-63 cells and U2OS cells, and after IOP was added to MG-63 cells and U2OS cells at different concentrations (10 μg/mL, 20 μg/mL, 40 μg/mL, 80 μg/mL, 160 μg/mL, and 320 μg/mL), compared with the control group, the cell proliferation activity was significantly reduced ( P < 0.05) when the IOP was at the concentrations of 80 μg/mL, 160 μg/mL, and 320 μg/mL after 48 h and 72 h of treatments. This result indicates that IOP can inhibit the proliferation of osteosarcoma cells.
